Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
